title: What font is this?
content:
Hi,

Can anybody please identify this font?

Many thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220903im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cursive%20text%20clear_6438.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cursive text clear.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220903/http:/typophile.com/files/cursive%20text%20clear.png) | 134.38 KB |
| [family.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220903/http:/typophile.com/files/family.png) | 30.96 KB |
author: matthobie

comments.content:
Congratulations! You are the first Type ID Requester to post in the _general_ forum -- the one with the by-line "All topics are welcome—except font ID requests": (\*)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220903im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeid_6050.PNG)

Can you explain why you posted in here? Just so we can ask Jared to make the by-line bigger, for example.

(\*) Edit: the first since that by-line appeared.

I can't see the arrow. Could you add an arrow pointing it out?

hhp
and just to close this out, it's [Jane Austen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220903/http:/www.ffonts.net/JaneAusten.font)
Sorry I posted my query in the wrong section and MANY thanks for identifying the font for me so promptly!!
